thread.title: WATCH: ISIS Suicide Bomber Ridiculed After Detonating Vest Too Early
thread.title_full: WATCH: ISIS Suicide Bomber Ridiculed After Detonating Vest Too Early

author: Kim Smith
title: WATCH: ISIS Suicide Bomber Ridiculed After Detonating Vest Too Early
text:
Russian Spy Ship Spotted Just Miles off East Coast 
Reactions to the bomber’s untimely death included such remarks as “Good riddance” and “Practice makes perfect.” No one felt sorry for a man who was trying to take out as many people as possible with the explosion. 
This isn’t the first time a jihadist has met a most unfortunate demise , and by the looks of how some of these guys are trained, it won’t be the last. 
No one is complaining. In fact, we could take time to thank them for making the world a safer place. 
Share this story on Facebook and Twitter is you got a little chuckle out of watching this suicide bomber blow himself up. What did you think of this? Scroll down to comment below! Advertisement Popular Right Now
